name: Late Winter Egg Hunt
description:
Who doesn't like hunting for eggs in the middle of winter? What are you going to use them for? Hmmmmmmmmm...

Github repo:

https://github.com/hpnrep6/GodotWildJam-LateWinterEggHunt

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Spacebar - Jump
E - Open/Close door
Escape - Return to Main Menu

Audio credits:

Background Music - TheAsianOnes
SFX - freesound.org (1, 2, 3)
